title: Cognitive Load Analysis and Learning Strategy Design in Graphic Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learners analyze real-time eye-tracking data using personal devices (BYOD) and learn to measure cognitive load while solving multi-step graphical problems. Assessment is summative-focused.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately measure cognitive load indicators (fixation duration, pupillary response) during graphic problem-solving processes
Learners can analyze interrelationships between problems to design efficient solution strategies
Learners can mimic advanced learners' thinking patterns (schema generation) by applying cognitive load theory models
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
